cause.description:
Al Gore lost the election to George Bush (who is also a douche) and this is his retalliation.
1. Al Gore Needs To Be Silenced.
2. The Myth Needs To Be Abolished.
3. People Need To Relax, And Not Go Out Of Their Way And Waste Their Time On A Presidential Publicity Stunt.
cause.mission: Prove to people that global warming isn't real. It is merely money grubbing celebrities jumping on the bandwagon, and trying to spread information on something that they infact know nothing about.
cause.name: Abolish The Global Warming Myth.
